alfredsnippet.name: QuickSort an Array (ascending sort by default).
alfredsnippet.snippet:
const quickSort = ([n, ...nums], desc) =>
  isNaN(n)
    ? []
    : [
        ...quickSort(nums.filter(v => (desc ? v > n : v <= n)), desc),
        n,
        ...quickSort(nums.filter(v => (!desc ? v > n : v <= n)), desc)
      ];
